Mauricio Verano Merino

  • About me
  • CV

I am a PhD student in the Software Engineering and Technology group at TU/e and Software Analysis and Transformation group at CWI. Currently, my PhD project is funded by a project in collaboration with Canon PP.

My research interests are:

  • Software language engineering
  • DSLs
  • Humand-computer interaction
  • Sports and technology
  • Cloud computing
